name: Runner Fruit Jumping
description:
'Runner Fruit Jumping' is a cartoon style leisure game. The small animals controlled by the player rotate on the fruit. You need to jump the small animals from one fruit to another.
[Game operation]
Mouse click operation
[Game features]
Click the mouse on the screen and the small animal will jump out of the current fruit. Whether it can fall on the next fruit requires you to judge whether the rotation eccentricity angle points to the next fruit.
The small animals you control will increase one point every time they skip a fruit. See how many points you can get at most.
The game atmosphere is relaxed and the operation is simple, but it is not easy to get high scores. Those who like challenges can try.
